verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>. I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>: before the <S%H430>gods<s%> will I sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> unto thee.

I will <S%H7812>worship<s%> toward thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and for thy <S%H571>truth<s%>: for thou hast <S%H1431>magnified<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%> above all thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>cried<s%> thou <S%H6030>answeredst<s%> me, and <S%H7292>strengthenedst<s%> me with <S%H5797>strength<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when they <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Yea, they shall <S%H7891>sing<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Though the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H7311>high<s%>, yet hath he <S%H7200>respect<s%> unto the <S%H8217>lowly<s%>: but the <S%H1364>proud<s%> he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> afar <S%H4801>off<s%>.

Though I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, thou wilt <S%H2421>revive<s%> me: thou shalt stretch <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1584>perfect<s%> that which concerneth me: thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: <S%H7503>forsake<s%> not the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thine own <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
